sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Rows, Type, Hand, Pointer, Mic, Info } from 'lucide-react'; const AccessibilityPage = () => { const [displayDensity, setDisplayDensity] = useState('compact'); const [fontScale, setFontScale] = useState(110); const [gestures, setGestures] = useState({ lateralSwipe: true, pinchZoom: false, }); const [voiceCommands] = useState([ { id: 1, command: '"NARVO, OPEN NEWSFEED"', active: true }, { id: 2, command: '"NARVO, BRIGHTNESS UP"', active: true }, ]); const densityOptions = [ { id: 'compact', label: 'Compact', desc: 'MAX_DENSITY_MODE // MIN_PADDING', bars: 4 }, { id: 'standard', label: 'Standard', desc: 'BALANCED_FLOW // OPTIMAL_READ', bars: 2 }, { id: 'expanded', label: 'Expanded', desc: 'MAX_WHITESPACE // FOCUS_DOCK', bars: 1 }, ]; const toggleGesture = (key) => { setGestures(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: !prev[key] })); }; return (
{/* 01: Display Density */}
LAYER_01

DISPLAY_DENSITY

ADJUST THE INFORMATION DENSITY OF THE BROADCAST GRID. HIGHER DENSITY ALLOWS FOR MAXIMUM DATA THROUGHPUT.

{densityOptions.map(option => (
{/* 02: Font Scaling */}
LAYER_02

FONT_SCALING

SCALE_FACTOR {fontScale}%
setFontScale(parseInt(e.target.value))} data-testid="font-scale-slider" />
75% 100% 150%
OUTPUT_PREVIEW
HEADLINE // SPACE GROTESK

BREAKING: GLOBAL_MARKET_NODE_4 SHIFT REPORTED.

BODY // JETBRAINS MONO

SYSTEM ANALYSIS DETECTS 14% FLUCTUATION. NODES 4, 8, AND 12 ARE OPERATING AT PEAK CAPACITY.

FONT SCALING AFFECTS ALL TERMINAL READOUTS. BROADCAST GRAPHICS MAINTAIN FIXED RATIOS FOR INTEGRITY.

{/* 03: Interaction */}
LAYER_03

UI_INTERACTION

GESTURAL_CONTROL

{/* Lateral Swipe */}
Lateral Swipe

NAV_DATA_STREAMS

toggleGesture('lateralSwipe')} className="w-4 h-4 md:w-5 md:h-5 bg-transparent narvo-border checked:bg-primary focus:ring-0 cursor-pointer" data-testid="gesture-swipe" />
{/* Pinch Zoom */}
Pinch Zoom

EXPAND_MAP_DOCK

toggleGesture('pinchZoom')} className="w-4 h-4 md:w-5 md:h-5 bg-transparent narvo-border checked:bg-primary focus:ring-0 cursor-pointer" data-testid="gesture-pinch" />

VOICE_COMMANDS

‚óè LISTENING_V2
{/* Voice Waveform */}
{[8, 16, 24, 20, 28, 12, 20, 10].map((h, i) => (
))}
{voiceCommands.map(cmd => ( ))}
); }; export default AccessibilityPage;
